actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works.
Reported to House from the Committee on Public Works with amendment, H. Rept. 93-1602.

official_title: A bill to amend title 3, United States Code, to provide for the protection of foreign diplomatic missions, to increase the size of the Executive Protective Service.

summary.text: Authorizes the use of Federal funds to reimburse local governments for their expenditures for the protection of foreign diplomatic missions. Increases the size of the Executive Protective Service. Establishes an additional ten positions in the United States Secret Service.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 3, United States Code, to provide for the protection of foreign diplomatic missions, to increase the size of the Executive Protective Service.
